trans-unit.source: SSL is activated. However, your IP is allowed to enter unsecure mode for maintenance or local IP issues.
trans-unit.target: SSL is activated. However, your IP is allowed to enter unsecure mode for maintenance or local IP issues.

trans-unit.source: SSL is activated. Please connect using the following link to [1]log in to secure mode (https://)[/1]
trans-unit.target: SSL is activated. Please connect using the following link to [1]log in to secure mode (https://)[/1]

trans-unit.source: The employee does not exist, or the password provided is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: The employee does not exist, or the password provided is incorrect.

trans-unit.source: This employee does not manage the shop anymore (either the shop has been deleted or permissions have been revoked).
trans-unit.target: This employee does not manage the shop anymore (either the shop has been deleted or permissions have been revoked).

trans-unit.note: Context: File: controllers/admin/AdminLoginController.php:338 Comment: check matching employee id with its email

trans-unit.source: You can reset your password every %d minute(s) only. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: You can reset your password every %d minute(s) only. Please try again later.

trans-unit.source: Please, check your mailbox. A link to reset your password has been sent to you.
trans-unit.target: Please, check your mailbox. A link to reset your password has been sent to you.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while attempting to reset your password.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while attempting to reset your password.

trans-unit.source: The password is missing: please enter your new password.
trans-unit.target: The password is missing: please enter your new password.

trans-unit.source: The password is not in a valid format.
trans-unit.target: The password is not in a valid format.

trans-unit.source: The confirmation is empty: please fill in the password confirmation as well.
trans-unit.target: The confirmation is empty: please fill in the password confirmation as well.

trans-unit.source: The password and its confirmation do not match. Please double check both passwords.
trans-unit.target: The password and its confirmation do not match. Please double check both passwords.

trans-unit.source: Your password reset request expired. Please start again.
trans-unit.target: Your password reset request expired. Please start again.
trans-unit.note: Context: File: controllers/admin/AdminLoginController.php:346 Comment: To update password, we must have the temporary reset token that matches.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while attempting to change your password.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while attempting to change your password.

trans-unit.source: The password has been changed successfully.
trans-unit.target: The password has been changed successfully.
